short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight various AWS accounts so you can tell which one you're in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AWS SSO makes it easy to change accounts but there is no visual indicator of which account you are currently logged in to.  This simple extension changes the color of the AWS logo depending on the current AWS account.
